requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP1
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: It's a visual novel, it can run on a potato

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Processor (Pentium 4 1.7 Ghz or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
